sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Axios from 'axios' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faUpload } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import axios from 'axios' import apiBasePath from './globalVars' function EditAlbum() { const navigate = useNavigate() const { id } = useParams() const [formData, setFormData] = useState( { artist: '', title: '', genre: '', recordLabel: '', releaseDate: '', coverImage: '', coverImageName: '' } ) useEffect( () => { Axios.get(apiBasePath + '/getalbum/' + id) .then( res => { setFormData( { artist: res.data[0].artist, title: res.data[0].title, genre: res.data[0].genre, recordLabel: res.data[0].recordlabel, releaseDate: (res.data[0].releasedate) ? res.data[0].releasedate.substring(0, 10) : '', coverImageName: 'Current File' } ) } ) }, [] ) const handleChange = event => { setFormData( { ...formData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value } ) } const handleImageChange = event => { setFormData( { ...formData, coverImage: event.target.files[0], coverImageName: event.target.files[0].name } ) } const handleSubmit = event => { console.log('here') event.preventDefault() let formDataObj = new FormData() formDataObj.append('albumid',id) formDataObj.append('artist',formData.artist) formDataObj.append('title',formData.title) formDataObj.append('genre',formData.genre) formDataObj.append('recordLabel',formData.recordLabel) formDataObj.append('releaseDate',formData.releaseDate) if (formData.coverImageName !== 'Current File') { formDataObj.append('coverImage',formData.coverImage) } axios.post( apiBasePath + '/editalbum', formDataObj, { headers: { "Content-Type": 'multipart/form-data' } } ) .then( res => { console.log(res) var confirm = window.confirm('Album updated') confirm ? navigate('/') : void (0) } ) .catch(err => {console.log(err)}) } return ( <>

Albums of the Year

Edit Album

) } export default EditAlbum
